Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglass, Homan and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/St. Louis.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Halsted
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Halsted due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Halsted due to signal problems. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
